tool_description:
Background Removal Image, this API provides fast image background removal.

The Remove Background Image API is a service that provides the ability to remove the backgrung of an image. This API allows users to remove the background from an online image URL or from a file uploaded from their device.

The API offers an easy and efficient way to remove unwanted backgrounds from images without the need for complex software or intricate image processing. By using the API, users can remove the backe...
